document_title: Fatty liver: Causes, symptoms and prevention
subsection_content: Currently, medicine has not yet found a specific treatment for fatty liver disease. Fatty liver treatment methods only aim to reduce the effects of disease symptoms on daily activities and prevent the disease from progressing seriously. A healthy lifestyle, no alcohol and good control of other diseases (if any) is the optimal method not only in treating but also preventing fatty liver. Especially weight loss for overweight and obese people.(4)
